title: China expected to announce highly anticipated fiscal stimulus package
content: Authorities in Beijing have ramped up stimulus announcements since late September in an effort to bolster its flagging economy.
summary: Authorities in Beijing have ramped up stimulus announcements since late September in an effort to bolster its flagging economy.

title: Nissan shares plunge over 10% after downbeat quarterly results, production-cut plans
content: The automaker posted disappointing second-quarter results and announced reductions in production and staff.
summary: The automaker posted disappointing second-quarter results and announced reductions in production and staff.

title: Powell says he would not resign as Fed chief if Trump asked for his resignation
content: When asked whether he would resign if asked by Trump, the Fed chair simply said: "No."
summary: When asked whether he would resign if asked by Trump, the Fed chair simply said: "No."

title: Federal Reserve cuts interest rates by a quarter point
content: The Federal Reserve approved its second consecutive interest rate cut Thursday.
summary: The Federal Reserve approved its second consecutive interest rate cut Thursday.

title: What Trump’s historic election victory means for the global economy
content: The former president's litany of pledges include steep tariffs, tax cuts, deregulation and a push to withdraw from key global agreements.
summary: The former president's litany of pledges include steep tariffs, tax cuts, deregulation and a push to withdraw from key global agreements.

title: How Samsung fell behind in the AI boom leading to a $126 billion wipeout
content: Samsung Electronics has fallen behind long-time rival SK Hynix in the area of high-bandwith memory.
summary: Samsung Electronics has fallen behind long-time rival SK Hynix in the area of high-bandwith memory.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Powell maintains that elections won't sway Fed's policy
content: If inflation resurfaces because of the incoming administration's policies, the Fed’s likely to stay its hand in lowering rates.
summary: If inflation resurfaces because of the incoming administration's policies, the Fed’s likely to stay its hand in lowering rates.

title: How Elon Musk stands to cash in on Trump's presidential victory
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk poured at least $130 million into a pro-Trump campaign effort after an assassination attempt on the former president in July.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk poured at least $130 million into a pro-Trump campaign effort after an assassination attempt on the former president in July.

title: American interest in moving abroad skyrockets after Trump's win — here's how many would actually leave
content: Google Trends showed searches related to "leaving the country" and "how to move to …" spiked following the news that Donald Trump is returning to the White House.
summary: Google Trends showed searches related to "leaving the country" and "how to move to …" spiked following the news that Donald Trump is returning to the White House.

title: Trump likely to uphold CHIPS Act despite his campaign rhetoric, policy experts say
content: President elect Donald Trump is unlikely to roll back the Biden administration’s CHIPS and Science Act, despite his campaign rhetoric on the bill, experts say.
summary: President elect Donald Trump is unlikely to roll back the Biden administration’s CHIPS and Science Act, despite his campaign rhetoric on the bill, experts say.

title: DoubleLine's Gundlach says expect higher rates if Republicans also win the House
content: DoubleLine's Jeffrey Gundlach said interest rates could shoot higher if Republicans end up controlling the House and securing a governing trifecta.
summary: DoubleLine's Jeffrey Gundlach said interest rates could shoot higher if Republicans end up controlling the House and securing a governing trifecta.

title: China October exports record highest jump in 19 months, imports decline more than expected
content: The world's second largest economy has been grappling with weakening domestic consumption and a protracted property crisis, with exports being a rare bright spot.
summary: The world's second largest economy has been grappling with weakening domestic consumption and a protracted property crisis, with exports being a rare bright spot.

title: Traders see good chance the Fed cuts again in December then skips in January
content: Fed funds futures contracts pointed to a roughly 75% probability that the U.S. central bank would cut rates again in December.
summary: Fed funds futures contracts pointed to a roughly 75% probability that the U.S. central bank would cut rates again in December.

title: Block reports revenue miss but a slight beat on earnings
content: Shares of Square parent Block tumbled in extended trading on Thursday after the company reported disappointing revenue for the third quarter.
summary: Shares of Square parent Block tumbled in extended trading on Thursday after the company reported disappointing revenue for the third quarter.

title: Britain loves its 'special relationship' with the U.S. — but that doesn't mean Trump will love it back

title: Germany appoints new finance minister as pressure for quick snap elections mounts
content: Jörg Kukies was appointed as the new German finance minister on Thursday, replacing Christian Lindner.

title: Former Treasury Secretary Mnuchin says Trump's top priorities will be tax cuts, Iran sanctions and tariffs
content: Tax cuts are 'a signature part of his program,' Mnuchin said in a "Squawk Box" interview.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: How will the next Trump administration impact India?
content: India is likely to have both winners and losers if President-elect Donald Trump chooses to enact trade tariffs, cut corporation tax, immigration and subsidies.
summary: India is likely to have both winners and losers if President-elect Donald Trump chooses to enact trade tariffs, cut corporation tax, immigration and subsidies.

title: AppLovin, top tech stock of the year, soars another 46% on earnings beat
content: AppLovin was already the best-performing tech stock of 2024, and that was before the stock popped on a big earnings beat.

title: Americans are flocking to expat websites after the election: 'They want out, fast'
content: Tens of thousands of Americans are looking into moving abroad after Donald Trump's historic presidential reelection.

title: Bentley Motors further delays all-EV plan amid weak demand as it embraces plug-in hybrids
content: Bentley said it plans to offer a new EV or plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) each year until 2035, starting with its first all-electric vehicles in 2026.
summary: Bentley said it plans to offer a new EV or plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) each year until 2035, starting with its first all-electric vehicles in 2026.

title: Wall Street expects Trump presidency will unlock deal-making
content: Deal-making has slowed in recent years, largely due to high interest rates, soaring company valuations and a tight regulatory environment.
summary: Deal-making has slowed in recent years, largely due to high interest rates, soaring company valuations and a tight regulatory environment.

title: Trump victory deals latest heavy blow to a struggling Germany
content: Donald Trump's election as U.S. President could be yet another major blow for the struggling German economy.

title: Moderna posts surprise profit as Covid vaccine sales impress, cost cuts take hold

title: Germany's ruling coalition collapses as Chancellor Scholz fires finance minister
content: The three-year-old union between Scholz's Social Democratic Party (SPD), the Greens and Lindner's Free Democratic Party (FDP) had been on shaky ground for some time.

title: Trump win and threat of more tariffs raises expectations for more China stimulus
